snippet.title: Pinkatana - Ludwig Jam Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Made this game for the ludwig game jam, and I'm looking forward to making it a full release!

You can download the demo now at https://pencilwing.itch.io/pinkatana
and you can support the full release at https://www.patreon.com/pencilwing

Sharing is greatly appreciated!
